_comment: VALID FormData examples for validation testing. All should pass validation.

personalValues.description: Major value with all fields populated

data.title: Physical Health and Wellness
data.detailedDescription: Maintaining physical health through regular exercise, balanced nutrition, and adequate rest to support longevity and quality of life.
data.freeformNotes: Focus on sustainable habits rather than extreme changes.
data.alignmentGuidance: Prioritize activities that build strength, cardiovascular health, and flexibility. Avoid sedentary lifestyle choices.

data.title: Complete Database Migration
data.detailedDescription: Migrate application database to use new three-layer architecture with improved validation and repository patterns.
data.freeformNotes: This is a critical technical milestone for the application.
data.actionPlan:
1. Complete validation layer
2. Implement repository pattern
3. Update all views to use new patterns
4. Write comprehensive tests
